result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin

result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ sé sa ḃaile anois nó d'ḟág sé an teaċ seo uair an ċloig ó ẛinHe should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.

result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.

result.eng: You were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ga: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.html: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!

result.eng: Ten shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.
result.ga: Deich scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoirí
result.orig: Deich scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoirí
result.html: Deich scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoiríTen shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.
result.ponchtml: Deiċ scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoiríTen shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.

result.eng: The exam lasted an hour and a half.
result.ga: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leith
result.orig: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leith
result.html: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leithThe exam lasted an hour and a half.
result.ponchtml: Ṁair an scrúdú uair go leiṫThe exam lasted an hour and a half.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ga: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.orig: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar

result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a ċloig a ċaiṫeaṁ ar an mbóṫarYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: I was waiting for an hour for a taxi.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag fanacht uair an chloig ar thacsaí
result.orig: Bhí mé ag fanacht uair an chloig ar thacsaí
result.html: Bhí mé ag fanacht uair an chloig ar thacsaíI was waiting for an hour for a taxi.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag fanaċt uair an ċloig ar ṫacsaíI was waiting for an hour for a taxi.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
